text: The Minnesota State Mavericks women's ice hockey program represented Minnesota State University, Mankato during the 2014-15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. == Recruiting == {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:purple;color:gold;" | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Kathleen Ash || Forward ||||Colorado Selects |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Katie Bidulka || Goaltender||||Brampton Jr. Canadettes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Lindsey Coleman || Forward || ||Burnsville (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Amanda Conway || Forward || || Chicago Mission |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Hannah Davidson|| Forward||||Kitchener-Waterloo Rangers |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Anna Keys || Defender || || Park HS |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Elin Johansson|| Forward||||Modo |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Victoria Løvdal || Defender || || Norwegian National Team |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Amanda Martin|| Forward||||North American Hockey Academy |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Nicole Schammel || Forward || || Red Wing (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Emily Stegora|| Forward|||| Red Wing (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Emma Wittchow || Defender || || Burnsville (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} == 2014–15 Mavericks == ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:purple;color:gold;"| Regular Season |- !colspan=12 style="background:purple;color:gold;"| WCHA Tournament ==References== Minnesota State Category:Minnesota State Mavericks women's ice hockey seasons Minnesota State
